mapper.select: SELECT C.USER_ID, C.PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, C.PRODUCT_CNT, P.PRICE * C.PRODUCT_CNT AS PRICE, 'false' as CHK_YN FROM CART AS C LEFT JOIN PRODUCTS AS P ON C.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS ( ORDER_ID, USER_ID, ORDER_DATE, TOTAL_PRICE, REQUIRED_DATE, SHIPPED_DATE, SHIP_ADDR ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, NOW(), ${totalPrice}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 DAY), #{addr} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId};
